website_summaries.verdict: A quality juicer that will meet all of your needs without breaking the bank.
pros: We found that the juicer worked quickly and efficiently
It leaves little to no pulp in the juice
The motor is powerful, with two speeds to choose from
We found the one speed worked well for our juicing needs
The juicer is lightweight, which makes it easy to clean and store away
cons: The mouth is on the smaller side and may require you to chop ingredients first

customer_reviews.title: Beware of Regular Use
customer_reviews.text: WORKS GREAT! ****UPDATE 8/8/16***** I purchased this in March 2016 and used it everyday and took GREAT care of it, however as of 8/6/2016 the blade at the bottom came apart from the basket blade. Now I have to go through the hassle of trying to contact hamilton beach for new parts. If this machine can not handle daily wear & tear for a few months, then what's the point in buying it. I cleaned it properly & used it once each day. Just a warning to all of the everyday juicing individuals out there. Other than that it works good.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.Angel

customer_reviews.title: leaks everywhere
customer_reviews.text: It leaks, a lot. I got this because a few reviews across a few websites said it was easy to clean. I used it for the first time and it leaked, everywhere, it was spraying out liquid from the top of the catcher and along the locking latches. Now I have to clean the microwave that was behind it. Farthest thing from "easy to clean".
customer_reviews.author: Cook

customer_reviews.title: Fast juicer, effective juicer, affordable
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to use and juices fast. It is tedious to clean, though. The manual suggests to place a plastic bag in the pulp refuse container, which is a good idea as it lessens clean up time. But having to clean the other parts is still slightly challenging, but not too much. Not for the lazy . But I expected that the juicer will need to be cleaned (no such thing as a no-clean juicer right) so for the sake of drinking fresh juice I am willing to clean it. Because it is within my budget, I am ok with it. Not willing to part with more money for a fancy schmancy juicer.
customer_reviews.author: M Poblete

customer_reviews.title: Works very well!
customer_reviews.text: The process of putting it together for use was easy. The instructions are easy to understand. We juiced apples and carrots and it processed easily, no leaks, no drips, no problems. The pulp was dry. It wasn't as noisy as I thought it would be, my Kitchen Aid is more noisy. It came apart easily. I'm soaking everything in soapy water but if I'd rinsed all the pieces thoroughly I could have loaded it in the dishwasher w/out soaking. The blade is easy to clean w/ the brush that came w/ the machine. I'm very pleased and my grandson loved his apple carrot juice!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Loud
customer_reviews.text: The juicer was more difficult to clean than expected. It also is extremely loud and is very annoying to those asleep. The noise From the juicer would wake the household, kids included. So, the kids never miss the bus when I use the juicer in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Solid, Simple Juicer
customer_reviews.text: This a very straightforward juicer. It’s either on or it’s off. I don’t think it could be any simpler. The strength is fantastic. There is nothing it couldn’t juice! I do not like cleaning it, and the little metal basket is extra annoying, but I think that’s true of all juicers. This is a solid choice is you are looking for something simple and not expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Good appliance, bad shipping
customer_reviews.text: It is an amazing Juicer with Lots of power, I'm very impressed with it. I rate with 4 stars because the seller ships the appliance with it's original box and nothing else... for this reason it came damaged with a small piece of the pulp container broken.... It is not really a big deal, but it really sucks to get something damaged out of the box, especially if it is a gift... I suggest better packaging. PLEASE don't pay attention to the absolutely horrible job I did gluing the piece back together.
customer_reviews.author: galerian65

customer_reviews.title: Almost went with a more expensive juicer and so glad I went with this one
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to make celery juice for my husband who suffers from an autoimmune disorder which infects his joints. Not only does this juicer handle the heavy use (I make 16oz of celery juice everyday) but it’s so simple to use and clean. It’s loud but I don’t think there is a quiet juicer. Such a great value. Couldn’t be happier. And my hubs is feeling better!
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn M.

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from Hamilton Beach products!!
customer_reviews.text: I had this juicer for a couple of months and it died on me today April 12 2016. It figures that a Hamilton Beach product would crap out like always. I needed a juicer at a good price but you get what you pay for I guess. Pay for the better ones cause this one wont last too long. It died while I was juicing apples.
customer_reviews.author: Felix Guilfuchi

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: I only used for 5 weeks and is broken, not as powerful, a lot of noise and difficult to clean
customer_reviews.author: Yabo

customer_reviews.title: Review after 6 months of use
customer_reviews.text: I don't review stuff immediately after buying but after using for a while. This is a great juice maker. My husband use it 6 days a week and is perfect. What we do is that the compartment for the waste, we put a plastic bag, that way we don't wash it every day. 100% recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Noemi Nunez

customer_reviews.title: If arrived cracked.  Not a fan.  Frustrated. Just a warning
customer_reviews.text: Well was so excited to use it but it came cracked on the side. I hate that I have to go through the effort to mail it back. Really worries me that it was broken just may not reorder cause it seems to have bad durability
customer_reviews.author: Laceykthoughts

customer_reviews.title: a great juicer but its SUPER LOUD
customer_reviews.text: Im a early riser and I like to prep my juice and lunch in the morning before I head to work. Unfortunately, this juice is just too loud to use in the morning. Cleaning is not a problem, although it does have a small leak where the pulp catcher is. I do line the pulp catcher with a plastic bag so clean up is even faster.
customer_reviews.author: Wes & Denise Sakai

customer_reviews.title: Great juicer,, enjoy 100% natural juice for your entire family.
customer_reviews.text: I received item 2 weeks ago, so far it has paid for itself. My wife and I love carrot juice. weve been drinking it almost daily. If i would go to store a small 20 ounce jug cost me 4 bucks. In just 15 days the machine has paid for itself. My kids like orange juice and apple juice. The juicer is very powerful and gets the juice right out of the fruit. Easy clean up and large chute to get the fruit in. the only annoying thing about this juicer is that some of the pulp will fly out of chute as you are putting in the fruit or vegetables. very recommended.
customer_reviews.author: OMAR

customer_reviews.title: Takes way too long to clean
customer_reviews.text: It’s a pain to clean so many pieces. It takes me about 10 minutes to properly clean. It’s also not the greatest at getting all the juice out
customer_reviews.author: Cameron B.

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay product
customer_reviews.text: I like this juicer compared to my previous one. The only thing I don’t like is that it’s too loud and it shakes a lot while grinding. Or maybe I need to cut the fruits and veggies a bit smaller. But isn’t that, juicer needs to take care of that... anyways that’s it. I’ll continue to use this for now and see how long it’ll last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes juice
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. This is the only juicer I've had so not sure what to compare it to.juice can be a little pulpy and I feel like some juice gets left behind that you might get with a more expensive juicer but it's easy to use and somewhat easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: bennylog

customer_reviews.title: I like it, so far it's working
customer_reviews.text: I am used to omega masticating machine. I wanted something fast. So far it is working good best with non leafy greens.
customer_reviews.author: Mara

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, Easy to clean, Makes great juice.
customer_reviews.text: I love this juicer. I’m new to juicing and this item is great for a beginner. Clean up is really easy especially since I put a plastic bag in the part where the pulp goes. It’s easy to put together and disassemble to clean and most of the parts are dishwasher safe if you don’t feel like washing them by hand. I plan on using this juicer until the wheels fall off and then I’ll most likely upgrade. Great buy at a great price. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Good juicer
customer_reviews.text: Love this juicer. It’s easy to clean and you can make a lot at one time. My only issue is the pulp still has a lot of moisture in it so it’s not extracting all of the juice. Overall I would recommend this juicer.
customer_reviews.author: slade

customer_reviews.title: She is able to make her favorite ginger drink and water melon drink with little clean ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my mom for Mothers Day so I knew that I needed to get a machine that was easier to use. She is able to make her favorite ginger drink and water melon drink with little clean up. It does seem to leak a little bit but the clean up is easy. She is happy so I am happy!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Mask

customer_reviews.title: Best juicer
customer_reviews.text: I keep on gifting this juicer my juicer this model I’ve had over 10 years My mom has had hers for around the same amount of time It’s a great juicer for the price and they are long lasting
customer_reviews.author: KIKOAMAZON317

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price. Good for smaller family plans
customer_reviews.text: So this thing works great however, after juicing a couple things it starts to get hot and smell a little. Spendlt a bit more this time hoping it wouldnt do this but it does. Cant do a whole lot at one time.
customer_reviews.author: satara

customer_reviews.title: THIS LITTLE POWERHOUSE IS AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: Juices hard vegetable like carrots and beets FAST and with ease. I loved it so much I purchased one for my daughter who also loves it! I did a lot of research on the best juicer for the money because I am a Nutritionist and this is THE BEST!
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Great value for entry level juicer
customer_reviews.text: Love it so far. Much cheaper than other trendy models but seems to do the job. I am new to juicing and didn't want to spend a lot unless I knew I'd stick with it. As others noted, the discharge bin is very large (I recently made a half gallon of juice and didn't have to empty the bin). It is very loud but no more than a blender. The large feed chute means you don't have to cut up so much (a half an apple easily slides in). There are no extra features (it includes an on/off switch...) but I'm not sure what else you need. This is a great value for entry level juicer.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Breuer

customer_reviews.title: good juicer.
customer_reviews.text: This does a very good job and works quickly. I juiced everything in the fridge in the first week. When my wife finishes her cleanse, it will end up in the basement. But it does a very fine job and supports my wife's dream of being slender and healthy. 5 stars to that.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas R.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Never had a juicer till this one and it works great. It's not too loud and simple to use. For the price point you don't need to get an expensive juicer because this one does the job. Now I can get my celery juice in every morning.
customer_reviews.author: Jay GGDN

customer_reviews.title: Good juicer
customer_reviews.text: I like this juicer. Today everything is made cheep. You cant get away from it, but all in all, this thing is a good juicer, sturdy, made decent. Good for the price. I like it, and I used to have a Jack La Lane- so...
customer_reviews.author: francyn

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I had an Acme juicer years ago. Rather than spending all that money again I opted to give this one a try. Yes it is loud but works fantastic and cleans up very easily
customer_reviews.author: happy buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a couple of years ago, used it once then put it away. I just recently started to use it again. I have had others and they are so difficult to clean. This one is super duper easy to clean. It also work amazing, just as good as a very expensive one.
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and Works Wonderful I LOVE IT !
customer_reviews.text: WOW! I am very impressed with this juicer it is very powerful and I kept reading that it is so loud but I dont find it loud at all its perfect and for the price I am shocked because it really is powerful it juiced everything I added with ease juice tastes wonderful especially the fresh apple juice THIS JUICER IS AMAZING !!
customer_reviews.author: DOLORES T.

customer_reviews.title: In love with this product
customer_reviews.text: So In love with this juicer. I call it my “new toy” lol. Easy to ensamble, easy to clean, easy to “you name it”... Just bought another as a gift for someone else. Will try to upload a video. Very satisfied with this purchase so far
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Torrens

customer_reviews.title: Great and easy jucier
customer_reviews.text: I love this juicer so simple and easy to clean only down fall is it is loud. But everything else is so great it’s easy to over look.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Marie

customer_reviews.title: BEST JUICER.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this juicer for over 20 years and will continue to do so. It is a good price and it does the job. It's loud, but so are fire engines and they both offer something to benefit your life.
customer_reviews.author: sabrid2

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Besides being very loud when in use this is a great product. It’s easy to clean and juices many different things really well. Sometimes it seems to leave more chunks than expected but that’s ok for me. I have to clean it immediately after I juice so the debris doesn’t get stuck in the mesh filter but besides that I am happy with the purchase especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: Juicer
customer_reviews.text: you can't beat this for the price. Juices well. the pitcher to catch the juice is pretty small, but I keep a large pitcher next to the small one so I can just dump the juice in there when it gets full. Pieces of veggies do go flying everywhere, but I blame myself for that for not being quick enough lol. I was juicing beets the other day and my husband asked what happened to my forehead. It was beet juice that went flying on my forehead. we have used it every day and no complaints. Juicing is messy, what can I say?
customer_reviews.author: Melanie_and_David

customer_reviews.title: Do the job well
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this juicer to make apple juice mainly with kale. It works as supposed to. However, it does not extract all of the juice perfectly. The leftover fruit still has some moist in them which mean it could have been done better.
customer_reviews.author: Duy Le

customer_reviews.title: Best little juicer
customer_reviews.text: Great juicer can't say enough about this product. I love it and use daily. Powerful motor, easy clean up and wide mouth make using it easy. Powers through apples, carrots, celery, pears and greens. Just drop fruits and veggies in and out comes delicious juice. I have had other juicers but none compare to this one and for the price you will not regret it. I recommend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: My first juicer and it exceeded my expectations having only used a ninja blender in the past for juicing. I do wish the pulp and juice container were attached to the unit for more convenient storage.
customer_reviews.author: Yardie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Juicer
customer_reviews.text: So far so good with this. I was worried about buying a cheap juicer, but this is honestly pretty great and I am glad I didn't spend money on a more expensive one. Gets a lot of juice from fruits and vegetables and is easy to clean up. The only thing I don't like about it is that the cup for the juice is pretty small. So I have to keep a pitcher nearby to transfer the juice over when I am making a lot. But I still gave it 5 stars because it is a great juicer.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: New to juicing but after many read reviews went with this fella, love it so far.
customer_reviews.author: kelsey ciborowski

customer_reviews.title: Amazing fresh juices
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, easy to clean and makes amazing juices! It’s a little loud but doesn’t bother me. Does a great job for the price.
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: ... this juicer for a year and it still works great! It gets the juice out from the produce ...
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this juicer for a year and it still works great! It gets the juice out from the produce on the first round. I've even tried to run the pulp through again to be sure I've got all I can and nothing extra comes out! That's a powerful factor for me. I put a grocery bag in the collector bin to catch all the pulp so I don't have to clean it out every time. The juicing basket does require some work to clean so be sure to keep the cleaning brush handy at all times.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Eckholt

customer_reviews.title: I really like this product
customer_reviews.text: I was surprise with the ease it juiced everything I wanted it too. Clean up is fast and easy. It's powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Don't Waste Your Money
customer_reviews.text: I've had this juicer for maybe three weeks and the blade is already gone. It's just awful and smells like something is burning when I continue to try to "press" the vegetables to attempt to juice. Makes the craziest (kind of scary) noises too. Don't waste your money - just buy a good one from the start. I am so disappointed and plan to send it back. Total waste.
customer_reviews.author: Jul Red

customer_reviews.title: Good juicer
customer_reviews.text: This juicer works as expected and does a good job. It's pretty easy to set up, use and clean. The container that catches the juice isn't too big so you may need to transfer your juice into a larger container if you are trying to make more than 1-2 big glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Bob S.

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy Poorly-Made
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy, poorly-made, shakes all over the counter..doesn't grind small carrots..junk.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I exchanged a different brand juicer for this one after seeing a video review online. Its powerful and gets so much juice out of the fruits I put in. It can fit whole cucumbers and apples just fine. The only complaint I have is that its pretty loud especially when fruits are dropped in to be juiced. Other than that it is great and I recommend it. Its great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: chunky

customer_reviews.title: Great juicer and great value!
customer_reviews.text: This juicer has been great to us. We make juices a couple times a week and have had it for a few months now. We've had no problems We did our research and struggled between some more expensive models. If you're a pulp lover, this is likely not the juicer for you, as most of the pulp is syphened out. On the other hand, it makes for smooth juices. The debri/pulp that is pulled from the juice is pretty dry, suggesting the juicer is pretty efficient. Our compost is much richer for this pulp too!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: 500 ounces of juices so far...
customer_reviews.text: It's only been 2 weeks but I'm close to juicing 500 ounces of fruit and veggie juice. I'm very happy with the quality of juice it's producing, but thicker fruits like Guava and ripe pears have difficulties juicing, it get's clogged in the lower chamber. Leafy greens? don't waist it in this juicer, it will not juice a leafy greens, but perfect for celery, cucumber, carrots, radish, etc. It's very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Gigantic Dark

customer_reviews.title: This juicer freaks out sometimes
customer_reviews.text: I juice celery every morning...and sometimes carrots. Two of the three times I have juiced carrots, my juicer gets even louder and starts jerking and jumping across the counter. There is most definitely something wrong with this juicer. I've decided no more carrot juice. If it happens with the celery, which is my staple juice, I will be sending it back. I have not had this juicer for very long. I bought it because the price was right. I am hoping it will last a year...
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: buy a better juicer :(
customer_reviews.text: only use it for celery .. sucks !?!? i have to re juice the pulp and it yields about another cup of juice after the 2nd run and then there is still more u can squeeze by hand
customer_reviews.author: mr.scala

customer_reviews.title: We are very pleased with the simplicity of this machine
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 2 of these juicers. We are very pleased with the simplicity of this machine. A simple large ON/Off switch. A large powerful motor supplies the power, which is needed to juice high density items. After reading about this machine we found that it rated in the top ten juicer category, and it ranked at the top of it's list for the cheapest price. This is a no brainer. Why not get two of them if you are going to juice. Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: Earl Guidry

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very straightforward to use. Clean up is pretty easy, you have to go into it knowing juicing can get a bit messy. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Camille U.

customer_reviews.title: Get it
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used it for three days now making Celery juice it works great. I wish I had bought it in the winter when Celery was really good tho
customer_reviews.author: Eric neros

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: It's very easy to assemble, use and most import clean
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Makes it quick and easy and we feel great
customer_reviews.text: Got it because we read about the benefits of celery juice. Makes it quick and easy and we feel great.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Baker

customer_reviews.title: Juicing
customer_reviews.text: A very good choice for juicing the only problem is the blade needs replacing offend( about 2 months). We make 8 to 13 juices a day so it gets a workout.
customer_reviews.author: Alton J Herron

customer_reviews.title: Juice Love!
customer_reviews.text: It's an animal! I love it and have used it every day. Would be nice to have a slower speed option to maybe maximize juice? I recommend it to all my friends to get going on their juice journey!
customer_reviews.author: Marti

customer_reviews.title: Best healthy product , i recomend this product 100% agree
customer_reviews.text: Woot🎉woot🎊woot🎉woot🎊woot🎉 im so happy with my Hamilton Juice mashine squeezer , it work fine , i just squeeze some oranges , apple and cucumber, make healthy fresh juice , big thanks to Amazon with this great gorgeous deal 😀👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Boekhoudt

customer_reviews.title: It was a mess
customer_reviews.text: The pulp would fly all over in the lid,instead of dropping in the holder.It was a mess.I had to return it.Was such a task to clean it too.
customer_reviews.author: Pam C

customer_reviews.title: Great for Beginners!
customer_reviews.text: Nice juicer for a beginner, but I found clean up to be time consuming and the blades hard to clean. However for the price it made many juices I drink I would recommend this to anyone wanting to try juicing before comitting to a more expensive model
customer_reviews.author: rghersh

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: Its loud. Works great. Easy to clean. Add a bag to the pulp area for even easier clean up. Dishwasher friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very tedious to clean
customer_reviews.text: This is the kind of product you'll buy as a gift, use it once and then put it in a kitchen cabinet somewhere to be never seen again. Plan in spending about half an hour to clean this contraption when you're done with it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: It may be a bit noisy but I don't care. It is easy to use and makes great juice.
customer_reviews.author: Rebeca E. Eigen

customer_reviews.title: A good bargain machine
customer_reviews.text: It works as supposed to. My only complaints are the foam it tends to create in the juice (I've heard some better models cut down on that) and what a pain it is to clean out the strainer. If you clean it right away it's easy to clean but you need to jump right on it. It takes a little commitment but that's part of the point of juicing, really. I think it's a good machine for the low cost.
customer_reviews.author: KarmaCollar

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: It broke down after a year with very light use. Besides that i liked it
customer_reviews.author: olgac

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love it!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I received my Juicer yesterday and absolutely love it!! Great investment. It’s just a little bit loud, but GREAT!!
customer_reviews.author: Justina

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I wish that I had got this Juicer a lot sooner, it works great, and is easy to clean. I Love that fact that I can juice a small apple without have to cutting it up, it has great power.
customer_reviews.author: Nevertolate

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and cheerful
customer_reviews.text: I got what I paid for!!! It’s easy to assemble and to use it just doesn’t extract the juice as much as I want. I have an older, different brand of juicer which I prefer. It’s good as a backup, a 2nd home etc
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: More powerful than I had anticipated. Very easy to take apart, clean, and reassemble.
customer_reviews.author: Vinny

customer_reviews.title: Kudos to Hamilton Beach juice extractor!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first experience with a juice extractor and it was a very rewarding undertaking. The appliance is very efficient and easy to use. I was a bit intimidated by its size at first because it appeared to have so many parts but the accompanying instructions were so clear and easy to follow I needn't have worried. It produced perfect juice and cleanup was a snap. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: L J Powelll

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted to make my juice. Thanks for making a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Sewcrazy60

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: for this price point, it's amazing. it works extremely well. i highly recommend this product. honestly, amazing. definitely worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: David K.

customer_reviews.title: Works well as an inexpensive juicer
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this juicer It is easy to clean gives plenty of juice I got this to make cabbage juice to heal your stomach and it seems to be working
customer_reviews.author: Carole Larned

customer_reviews.title: Broke before 7days
customer_reviews.text: Received on a Sunday, Used juicer 3 times, and it doesn’t work anymore, returned the following Friday. It didn’t even last a week.
customer_reviews.author: Eb3000

customer_reviews.title: This is our first juicer and I'm pleased with the overall product and price
customer_reviews.text: This is our first juicer and I'm pleased with the overall product and price. It is very helpful to put a plastic bag in the large compartment to collect the waste. It works great and is not really that hard to clean. Simple design and easy to use. I was surprised with how much juice it produces and I am very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome appliance. A tiny bit hard to clean if ...
customer_reviews.text: Hamilton Beach Juice Extractor, where have you been all my life? This is an awesome appliance. A tiny bit hard to clean if you let it sit too long - so don't.
customer_reviews.author: CMA

customer_reviews.title: Fresh and easy to make juices with this unit
customer_reviews.text: New to juicing, using more so to enjoy fresh healthy juice and not bottled store bought. Unit is strong, easy to put together and take apart for cleaning. So far 2 weeks straight of using and works like the first day.
customer_reviews.author: RV living full time

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend getting this.
customer_reviews.text: It was worth it. Very easy to clean and use. It’s nice to make your own juice when you don’t feel like buying one. It does a good job separating the useless products into the big container.
customer_reviews.author: Ganzorig

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! I do juice cleanse all the time living in a warm climate and this works great for the price! I have to cut the apples in half but that's fine.
customer_reviews.author: E.H.

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: This juicer is amazing easy to assemble and clean it doesn't have so many parts. Perfect for me
customer_reviews.author: carlos j. almodovar

customer_reviews.title: Way too much of a project with every use.  Juicing is not for me!
customer_reviews.text: Clean up is more than you would think. Too involved and time consuming. I’ll stick to smoothies and other methods for healthy diet choices. Juicing is not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... picked this up based on consumer reports and its awesome. works as well as my old 300 dollar ...
customer_reviews.text: i picked this up based on consumer reports and its awesome. works as well as my old 300 dollar unit and is easier to clean
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Kevin Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use and Clean
customer_reviews.text: Got this to make celery juice and carrot juice. Great price and works Great!
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Really easy to assenbly and start using it in a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Candell

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable juicing
customer_reviews.text: Works just as well as a Breville for half the price. Unless you are investing in a masticating juicer there are no differences between any centrifugal brands - I have had many.
customer_reviews.author: N M

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: I use it everyday and I really really like it.
customer_reviews.author: mitch davis

customer_reviews.title: Love this juicer
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my best friends parents for Christmas because I had one just like it & love it. My only suggestion is to put a small plastic bag in the back part where the excess stuff goes so it's easier to clean. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Doodle

customer_reviews.title: Groovy...strong n EZ clean up.......1 ding though
customer_reviews.text: Read all the other previous reviews......and we concur, this juicer is awesome. We've only had it for a month or so and juice almost daily. Powerful, ez clean up, only thing I can ding it on is the fruit fibers clog up the rotating strainer quickly meaning you will have to clean more often if you decide to make more juice!! The little catch cup doesn't hold much and we really enjoy juicing so have an extra glass ready.
customer_reviews.author: Spicy Duck

customer_reviews.title: Good starter machine
customer_reviews.text: New to juicing, but this seems to do the trick - Not a heavy duty machine as motor stresses a little with denser foods. A bit louder than I expected. Otherwise happy with performance considering the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Will in Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Hamilton Beach Pro Juicer
customer_reviews.text: I am really pleased with this juicer for the money r costs.
customer_reviews.author: Gifts and Galore

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Juicing
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for health benefits at beginning of pandemic. Easy to use and clean. Looks great on my granite counter tops too. Great for blending fruits and veggies. Makes nice frothy beverage.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: There's a vent on the cover, very.poor design as the pulp spits out during juicing. I called technical support who said it's part of the design. Without it, not as much would be extracted. Hmmm. Not HAPPY. The pulp is very dry which is good, but the spitting of the pull not so good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Juicer
customer_reviews.text: Great price, makes really good juice, disassembles and cleans very easily in the dishwasher or by hand. Nothing to complain about here! I LOVE this juicer. Great job Hamilton Beach
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: I use it every day.
customer_reviews.text: I use it every day. Easy to use. Less parts to clean. Although, it does require taking it apart to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Silva

customer_reviews.title: Nice machine, price was right, works great.
customer_reviews.text: Like the product. Thanks for delivering on time especially during this quarantine period. Greatly appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: DALLAS

customer_reviews.title: Great product, truly amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: Best investment I’ve made this month! So easy to use and easier to clean and maintain. Has a wide mouth so you can drop a full apple (or fruit of your choice) into there without having to make a mess cutting them up
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: Best juicer out there!
customer_reviews.text: This juicer is so easy to use and so easy to clean up after use!! I did lots of research before buying and found that the Hamilton Beach Bog Mouth juicer was the best buy for the dollar. The price is reasonable and totally has met my needs. I would highly recommend this juicer to anyone,beginner like me or a pro!
customer_reviews.author: JoAnna Blau

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $$$
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Have had for 3 months and love it. A bit different to get rid of mineral buildup but that is likely the case on all juicers.
customer_reviews.author: Me

product_meta.title: Hamilton Beach Pro Juicer Machine, Big Mouth Large 3” Feedchute, Easy to Clean, Centrifugal, BPA Free, 800W (67608A), Silver
product_meta.description: Whether it’s an invigorating orange or nutrient-rich green, enjoying a fresh glass of homemade juice has never been easier. With its large chute and powerful motor, the Hamilton Beach big mouth Pro juicer makes quick work of fruits and vegetables with little prep time required.
feature_bullets: Healthy, homemade juice in seconds. Juice a variety of fruits and vegetables. Juicer is easy to assemble with extra-large pulp bin. Juice cup not included
3 year limited from the best-selling juice extractor brand. Includes access to dedicated U. S. customer support team of Hamilton beach employees
Easy to clean: Removable parts are dishwasher safe and BPA free

Extra-large 3 inch feed chute fits whole fruits and vegetables. Fit a whole apple, a peeled orange or a handful of kale. Less pre-cutting, and more continuous juicing for fresh fruit juice, vegetable juice, or nutrient packed celery juice
Powerful electric motor for maximum juice: 800w of power can turn a dense beet into smooth juice in seconds
Source: The Npd group/ retail tracking service, U. S. unit sales, 12 months ending january 2020

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
